abstract: Canadian Brig Gen Michael Rouleau says that Canadian troops stationed in Iraq to train and advise Iraqi forces were involved in firefight with Islamic State militants.
lead_paragraph: Canadian soldiers exchanged fire with Islamic State fighters in Iraq over the past week, a commander said Monday.
snippet: Canadian soldiers exchanged fire with Islamic State fighters in Iraq over the past week, a commander said Monday.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

headline.main: Canada: Troops Clash With ISIS in Iraq
headline.print_headline: Canada: Troops Clash With ISIS in Iraq
